mapper.select: SELECT U.USR_ID , U.USR_NAME , U.USR_IMAGE , U.USR_EMAIL , U.USR_SMS , U.USR_KAKAO , U.USR_ACTIVE , CC2.CCD_CODENAME AS USR_ACTIVE_CODE , U.USR_QUESTION , CC.CCD_CODENAME AS USR_QUESTION_CODE , U.USR_ANSWER , U.USR_TYPE , CC3.CCD_CODENAME AS USR_TYPE_CODE FROM TB_USER U , TB_COMMON_CODE CC , TB_COMMON_CODE CC2 , TB_COMMON_CODE CC3 WHERE USR_ID = #{usr_id} AND U.USR_QUESTION = CC.CCD_CODE AND U.USR_ACTIVE = CC2.CCD_CODE AND U.USR_TYPE = CC3.CCD_CODE
